items.description: Create a line plot visualization showing performance trends across frame counts for each condition
items.success_criteria: Generate line_plot_comparison.py and corresponding PNG file showing trends across frame counts

items.description: Create a heatmap visualization showing the improvement ratios (ST-GRPO vs Baseline) across conditions and frame counts
items.success_criteria: Generate heatmap_improvement.py and corresponding PNG file showing improvement patterns

items.description: Create a violin plot or box plot style visualization comparing baseline vs ST-GRPO distributions across all conditions
items.success_criteria: Generate distribution_comparison.py and corresponding PNG file showing performance distributions

items.description: Create a radar chart visualization showing performance across different conditions for selected frame counts
items.success_criteria: Generate radar_chart_performance.py and corresponding PNG file showing multi-dimensional comparison

items.description: Create a stacked bar chart showing absolute improvements by frame count and condition
items.success_criteria: Generate stacked_improvement_chart.py and corresponding PNG file showing improvement magnitudes
